doc:
Brian Geraghty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Geraghty 0 Brian Timothy Geraghty (born May 13, 1975) is an American actor, known for his role in the Academy Award–winning film The Hurt Locker, for his role alongside Denzel Washington in the 2012 film Flight, and for his recurring role in the acclaimed HBO drama series Boardwalk Empire. He appeared as a regular on NBC's Chicago P.D. from 2014 to 2016. Brian_Timothy_Geraghty ( born May_13_,_1975 ) is an_American_actor , known for his_role in the_Academy_Award – winning film The_Hurt_Locker , for his_role alongside Denzel_Washington in the_2012_film_Flight , and for his_recurring_role in the_acclaimed_HBO_drama_series_Boardwalk_Empire . He appeared as a_regular on NBC 's_Chicago_P.D. from 2014 to 2016 .
